general.gigTitle: build or rebuild website development as full stack developer and website design

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Web and Mobile Apps Developer
sellerCard.description:
Greetings, Fiverr Community! This is Tufael Ahmed, leading a complete software solution company in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

We've been delivering exceptional full-stack website and mobile app development services worldwide for various clients and companies, ranging from high-end firms to small & mid-sized organizations.

Services I Offer:

- Full Stack Website Development
- Front-end Development
- Backend Development
- Mobile App Development
- Android App
- iOS App
- Flutter App

Feel free to click the 'Contact me' button at the top right-hand corner, and let's talk more in the inbox.

description.content:
Hello Fiverr Buyers,


Are you looking for a professional web developer to build or rebuild a functional, modern, and dynamic custom website that enhances your online presence and drives your business forward?


If so, you've arrived at the right place!


I'm a professional full stack web developer with over 4 years of experience. With my expertise, I can develop responsive, SEO-friendly custom websites that support all devices, screens, and browsers.


Whether you need a personal blog, portfolio, corporate business site, or an e-commerce platform, I can tailor any site to meet your unique needs.



﻿What I offer to build your dream site in this GIG:


Programming Language:


  • JavaScript
  • PHP



Front-end Development:


  • React.js
  • Next.js
  • Jquery
  • TypeScript
  • HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript



Backend Development:


  • PHP - Laravel
  • Node.js - Express, Socket.io
  • Databases - MYSQL, MongoDB, Firebase Client/server



Why Do You Hire Me?


  • Experienced Website Builder
  • Quality Work & On-time Delivery
  • 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
  • Free Support for 30 Days After Completion

 


Let's build your dream site today that reflects your brand identity. ORDER with confidence, and enjoy my premium services.

slide.name: build or rebuild website development as full stack developer and website design

questionsAndAnswers.question: What should I need to provide to start developing a website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need the project details, Logo, and Content (text, images, videos, etc.) for each page and reference website links or designs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your experience in Website Development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I've worked as a full-stack web developer for the past four years and have successfully built 170+ custom websites for individuals, small businesses, and corporations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is Domain & hosting included in the package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, domain and hosting are a company's property registered to their name, which is provided by the client. However, I would love to help you find the best host domain registrar OR do everything for you in a custom package. Please feel free to message me anytime to discuss your requirements in detail

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all the pages are super responsive, mobile-friendly, and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you customize or redesign an existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, sure! I can. I will redesign, customize, or fix errors in an existing website according to your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you assist once the order is completed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, after completing the order, I'll provide you with 30 days of free support.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide source code?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you will receive a well-documented script and instructions on how to manipulate parameters.

packageList.title: Convert Figma to Custom Website
packageList.description: I'll Convert your Figma design into a beautiful, modern, responsive custom website.

packageList.title: Custom Website Development
packageList.description: Build 5 Pages of Dynamic, Functional Custom Website + SEO-Optimized + Responsive Design.

packageList.title: Advanced Website Design
packageList.description: Build 8-10 Pages of Dynamic, Functional Custom Website + SEO-Optimized + Responsive Design.

reviews.comment: Huge shoutout to this team for bringing MusicMeets to life! This group is seriously talented—they took my vision and turned it into something even better than I imagined. From the design to the functionality, he made sure everything was built to give artists, producers, and engineers the best experience possible.It’s not easy finding someone who truly understands what you’re trying to create, but he absolutely nailed it. If anyone ever needs a skilled, reliable, and detail-oriented developer, I highly recommend him. Couldn’t have done this without him! Appreciate the whole team, Excited to see where this goes. MusicMeets is live because of your hard work .

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the outstanding review! It has been great working with you and I hope to work with you again in the future.

reviews.comment: he is the man for any website development u need..i own a few companies and I will never have to look for another site developer again..exceptional service across all boards👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback, A pleasure to work with you :)

reviews.comment:
Great teamwork. 

Super communication, courtesy, technical knowledge and software expertise, work that exceeded my expectations.

I would also like to thank you very much for implementing every detail I requested in line with our wishes and explaining it patiently.

I look forward to the second step of continuing the project with you and developing it further.

amazing team
Kind regards

Brian Israel Aurin
CEO/ Simorgh Service Group LLC. USA

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the outstanding review! It has been great working with you and I hope to work with you again in the future.

reviews.comment: Tufnael did an amazing job setting up my Shopify store! The entire process was smooth and efficient, and he completed the setup much quicker than I anticipated. Whenever I had questions or encountered any issues, he was incredibly responsive and provided clear solutions right away.

seller_response.comment: A pleasure to work with you. Thank you so much :)

reviews.comment: Ahmed and his team are highly professional, with exceptional technical skills. I strongly recommend this outstanding team for any project. I’d like to give special kudos to Khalid and Nahid, who worked tirelessly to bring our project to life and played a key role in helping us start our journey. Look forward to work together to improve our online product and service. Thank you so much again, guys!

seller_response.comment:
Thank you so much for your kind words and generous recommendation! It’s truly a pleasure working with you. 

Khalid, Nahid, and the entire team are dedicated to delivering the best results, and we are thrilled to have contributed to your project's success.

Look forward to working together again, Thank you so much again, guys!

Ahmed and his team are highly professional, with exceptional technical skills. I strongly recommend this outstanding team for any project.
